primarySegments.name: Busy Professionals
primarySegments.description: Dog owners who work long hours and need reliable dog walking services to ensure their pets are taken care of during the day.

problemsNeeds: Desire for real-time updates on pet care
behaviors: Use the app during work hours
Engage with customer reviews and ratings

primarySegments.name: Elderly Pet Owners
primarySegments.description: Older adults who own dogs but may have physical limitations that prevent them from walking their pets regularly.

behaviors: Prefer scheduling via phone or simple app interfaces
Seek walkers with good interpersonal skills
May require assistance with app navigation

primarySegments.name: Young Urban Dwellers
primarySegments.description: Young adults living in urban areas who own dogs and have active lifestyles but need help with pet care due to social and work commitments.

problemsNeeds: Preference for eco-friendly and sustainable options
behaviors: Use the app for on-demand services
